game.name: DREDGE
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: DREDGE is a single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and dredge the depths for long-buried secrets. Explore a mysterious archipelago and discover why some things are best left forgotten.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DREDGE is a single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and dredge the depths for long-buried secrets. Explore a mysterious archipelago and discover why some things are best left forgotten.

reviewHighlights.text: Installed and opened. 10 hours later I was restless, delirious, seeing things as I played a man who was restless, delirious, and seeing things. 10/10
